name: Super Supers Adventures
description:
Be the Hero in this amazing action game!! 

Control LanderGuy the greatest hero of VCompany!! 

Save as many people as possible using your incredible powers!! 

  • WASD Keys to move the Character. 
  • Left mouse button for Strong Laser. 
  • Right click for Weak Laser. 
  • Hold Spacebar to activate super speed.

!!WARNING, THIS GAME IS A JOKE BASED ON A FICTIONAL UNIVERSE!!

!!THIS GAME CANNOT BE SOLD UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES,  ALWAYS HAS BEEN AND WILL ALWAYS BE FREE!!
